title: What app does news play from on Google Assistant?
content: I have my wake-up routine set to play the news. It seems like the only way I can get it to pause is by saying "pause the news" to Google Assistant, but I would like to be able to access an app to pause, play, go to next broadcast, etc. through the touchscreen interface. Does this exist?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
